base_description: Black oval sunglasses with thin metal frame.
part_description: Two oval lenses connected by a thin bridge, with thin arms extending from each lens' outer edge.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are held in place by the thin metal frame, with the bridge connecting them at the center. The arms pivot at the outer edges of the lenses, allowing them to open and close around the wearer's head.
external_interaction_description: The sunglasses provide eye protection from sunlight for the wearer. They rest on the nose and ears, with the arms securing them in place. They can be folded compactly when not in use.
